name: 一吃就胖
content: By by your side by by your side by by
支离破碎的心支离破碎我毫无感觉
因为当你在我身边时我感觉时间停滞不前
Tear it up tear it down
沉醉在我们心跳的声音里
Take me here take me now
Gettin' lost in a crowd with you
和你一起迷失在人群中
By by your side by by your side by by
By by your side by by your side by by
I waited for you all my life
Hold my hand and keep me close
牵着我的手与我亲密无间
